short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: xIS: eXtended Information Search; a new search engine for KAIST Portal articles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
xIS is an acronym of eXtended Information Search.
xIS is a new search engine for KAIST Portal articles.
xIS Provide a better searching environment for KAIST people.
xIS is a 2018 Fall semester KAIST CS408 project.
xIS is made by team CreamBears: H. Kang, J. Hong, and J. Kim.

To use xIS, you should be at "portal.kaist.ac.kr".
Type a search word you want to search and press the enter key.
You can see more results by using the "다음" button.
